pr_title: MULE-18828: Same MetadataCacheId when two configless operations have …

timeline.message: MULE-18828: Same MetadataCacheId when two configless operations have exactly the same category and resolver names

timeline.bodyText: I think the identifier can be null, we should consider that
timeline.author: lucianoRM

replies.bodyText: org.mule.runtime.ast.api.util.BaseComponentAstDecorator#toString it is not checking for null. It should always have an identifier, if it is null I would say there is a bug in AST.
replies.author: gsfernandes

replies.bodyText: Confirmed by Rodro, it should not be null.
replies.author: gsfernandes
